document.full_text: a policeman was killed when a bomb exploded under his car in the northern irish town of omagh saturday, the first killing in the british-controlled province for two years.
document.title: car bomb kills policeman in northern ireland
lines_and_colors: a policeman was killed when a bomb exploded under his car in the northern irish town of omagh saturday, the first killing in the british-controlled province for two years.
